entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Témiscamingue
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:38 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.9°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 20 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
